english.segment1: He wakes up everyday the same. Believing he's gonna make a change. Never wonders if but when
english.segment2: I guarantee he can find a way. To reach out and make somebody's day. Cuz' someone took the time with him
english.segment3: He believes it's the little things. That make a great big change
english.segment4: Hey! Mr.Lovewell do in a day what you do everyday. No matter how small. Believing that it's all the same
english.segment5: Come on Mr.Lovewell. We could use a few more just like you. Who care enough to give this life away. Cuz' you've been changed. The generous Mr.Lovewell loves today
english.segment6: May be a simple how do you do. The kinda thing that could pull them through. A minute or two could mean so much
english.segment7: Maybe it's the one to cross the street. Who's asking if their's anything they need. Cuz they will know it's by a love. It may not mean that much to him. But it;s the world to them
english.segment8: Hey! Mr.Lovewell do in a day what you do everyday. No matter how small. Believing that it's all the same
english.segment9: Come on Mr.Lovewell. We could use a few more just like you. Who care enough to give this life away. Cuz' you've been changed. The generous Mr.Lovewell loves today
english.segment10: We all need more Mr.Lovewell. We all need more Mr.Lovewell. We all need more Mr.Lovewell
english.segment11: Hey! Mr.Lovewell do in a day what you do everyday. No matter how small. Believing that it's all the same
english.segment12: Come on Mr.Lovewell. We could use a few more just like you. Who care enough to give this life away. Cuz' you've been changed. The generous Mr.Lovewell loves today
